conclusion: The current recipe system requires comprehensive overhaul to meet the 8k-10k token comprehensive task detail requirements. This is a critical blocker that must be addressed before the agent execution system can be considered reliable. The remediation plan provides a systematic approach to achieve full compliance within 6-8 weeks.
